General.Name: Xinjiang Ba Yi Iron & Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: XinJiang Ba Yi Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd. focuses on smelting, rolling, processing, and selling of steel products in China. Its principal products comprise of hot-rolled coils, rebar, medium and thick plates, wire rods, profiles, hot-dip galvanized coils, bars, and cold-rolled coils. The company is based in Ürümqi, China.
